name: oxigent-back
description: Test for full-stack position at Oxigent

scripts.test: npm run build && cd src/db && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --url 'mysql://maia:mysqlpass@mysqltesting/test' && cd ../.. && mocha --reporter spec
scripts.start: npm run build && cd src/db && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --url 'mysql://maia:mysqlpass@mysqlprod/oxygent' && cd ../.. && node dist/app.js
